title: Baked Onion Chicken
directions: 1 Crush the soup mix in the envelope with a rolling pin. Stir the soup mix, bread crumbs and black pepper on a plate. Beat the egg and water in a shallow dish.
2 Dip the chicken into the egg mixture. Coat the chicken with the crumb mixture. Place the chicken onto a baking sheet. Drizzle with the butter, if desired.
3 Bake at 400°F. for 20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked though.
ingredients: 1 envelope (about 1 ounce) dry onion recipe soup & dip mix
2/3 cup plain dry bread crumbs or cracker crumbs
1 3/4 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
